title: A non-invasive AI-based system for precise grading of anosmia in COVID-19 using neuroimaging
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Hossam Magdy Balaha, Mayada Elgendy, Ahmed Alksas, Mohamed Shehata, Norah Saleh Alghamdi, Fatma Taher, Mohammed Ghazal, Mahitab Ghoneim, Eslam Hamed Abdou, Fatma Sherif, Ahmed Elgarayhi, Mohammed Sallah, Mohamed Abdelbadie Salem, Elsharawy Kamal, Harpal Sandhu, Ayman El-Baz
